Package xyz.app

Class Security

java.lang.Object
xyz.app.Security
public class Security
extends java.lang.Object
Implements Ring Security method for user sessions with a default ring behavior style of ROOT -> PUBLIC. Change this file if you wish to change how you identify access levels

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Security.Resolver
    Resolver stores the state of an attempted access to a given route profile.
